wikipedia_page.main: Peter Antony Moran (born 13 April 1935) is the former Roman Catholic Bishop of the Diocese of Aberdeen, Scotland.

response: Poore studied privately with Peter Moran in Philadelphia, at the Pennsylvania Academy of the Fine Arts under Thomas Eakins, then at the National Academy of Design in New York City.Henry Rankin Poore, from Philadelphia Sketch Club. He studied further at the Académie Julian in Paris, where his teachers included Évariste Vital Luminais and William-Adolphe Bouguereau. He exhibited The Night of the Nativity at the Salon of 1889.The Laurelled Chefs-d'Oeuvre d'Art from the Paris Exhibition and Salon (Philadelphia: Gebbie & Co., 1889), [no page numbers].
